query.name: findAllParents
query.sql: SELECT * FROM STUDY WHERE parent_study_id is null

query.name: findAllByParent
query.sql: SELECT * FROM STUDY WHERE parent_study_id=? order by date_updated desc

query.name: findAllByParentLimit5
query.sql: SELECT * FROM STUDY WHERE parent_study_id=? order by date_updated desc limit 5

query.name: findAllByUser
query.sql: SELECT s.* FROM study s, study_user_role sur WHERE sur.user_name = ? AND s.study_id=sur.study_id

query.name: findAllStudiesBySubject
query.sql: SELECT st.* FROM study_subject ss, study st WHERE ss.study_id = st.study_id AND (ss.subject_id=?)
